moves.1. e4 e5 2. d4 d6: Not the best way to proceed.
moves.4. Nc3 dxe5 5. Nf3: I might have considered Nd5 Qd6, Bg5 and white has an edge.
moves.7... h6 8. Bxf6 Qxf6 9. O-O-O: I start stacking on the d-file.
moves.10. h3 Bc5 11. Rd2 O-O 12. g3 Nb6 13. Bg: My eyes popped when I saw that!
moves.14. Qxd8+: I munch on a tasty rook...
moves.17... Be6 18. b3: I keep the bishop out of c4.
moves.19. Kb2 Bb4 20. Nf5: Why oh why did I do that?
moves.25... Re8: I almost played Kd1?? I was concerned about the back rank threat.
moves.26. Rg4+ Kf8: But I saw that my rook can block with Rd1.
moves.27. Re4: He resigned because of the almost forced trade of rooks.

gameName: How to be on top of the game...
